title: Solar Orbiter L2 1-Minute Magnetometer Data Derived from Low Latency Data - T. Horbury (The Blackett Laboratory, Imperial College London)

info.x_cadence_note: Counts based on variable 'EPOCH' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/solar-orbiter/mag/science/l2/rtn-ll-1min/2021/solo_l2_mag-rtn-ll-1-minute_20210905_v04.cdf. The most common cadence, 59999996424 [ns] = PT59.999996S, occurred for 46.6991% of the 672 timesteps.
info.contact: T. Horbury @ The Blackett Laboratory, Imperial College London

parameters.name: Time
parameters.x_description: Epoch encoded as Terrestrial Time on rotating Earth geoid, ns since J2000

parameters.name: B_RTN
parameters.description: Magnetic field vector in RTN coordinates
